Prediction and evaluation for baseline models including cross validation

Source: R/predict_baselines.R
predict_baselines.Rd

Prediction and evaluation for baseline models including cross validation

predict_baselines(
  data,
  cv_setting,
  col_id = NULL,
  col_date = "index",
  col_value = "value",
  transform = NULL,
  frequency = 4,
  multiple_h = NULL
)

Arguments

data

data.table object
cv_setting

cross valudation settings. List Requiring

  • periods_train

  • periods_val

  • periods_test

  • skip_span
col_id

Optional ID column in data, default to "ticker"
col_date

Date column in data, default to "index"
col_value

Value column in data, default to "value"
transform

One of NULL, "normalize" and "box" for Box-Cox transformation
frequency

time series frequency, e.g. 4 for quarters and 12 for months
multiple_h

NULL if forecast horizon equals cv_setting$n_test, else named list of forecast horizons for accuracy measures

Value

list with accuracy and forecasts (point forecast and PI)

Contents

Developed by Thomas Fuchs.
